name: Rock, the Tree Hugger
description: A "tree" hugging, human "saving" rock, whose mission is to, well, "hug" trees and "save" humans, without touching the dangerous forest fire.
minimum_requirements: Additional Notes: Anything made since 2004 should work.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, 7 SP1+, 8, 9 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-2120 CPU @ 3.30GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: It's not a terrible concept but this game has enough ideas for about one level. The 15 levels come to a ridiculously short playtime; would have been better suited as a web-based flash game.
